Web Links for the Dorothy Hodgkin Memorial lecture

A note about the launch of an appeal to fund a possible memorial for Dorothy in Oxford was published in the March 1998 issue of 'Crystallography News'

This lecture is now sponsored jointly by

  • the Oxford International Women's Festival
  • Oxford branch of AWiSE (Association of Women in Science and Engineering)
  • Somerville College , Oxford
  • Oxford University Museum of Natural History

Other Dorothy Hodgkin Memorials

  • The British Crystallographic Association triennial Dorothy Hodgkin prize
  • The Royal Society postdoctoral fellowship scheme, 'the Dorothy Hodgkin Fellowships',
  • On 14 May 2001 the Royal Society of Chemistry presented a 'Chemistry Landmark' plaque
Please send news of any other 'Dorothy Hodgkin' memorials to the BCA, webmaster.

Page last updated 20 March 2007
Kate Crennell
